explains: v. 关紧，锁好（门窗）；（使）牢固，（使）固定；握住，咬住；盯住……不放，集中注意力于……；缠着，纠缠；系牢，扣紧
wordGroup: fasten on v. 集中于；把...强加于；纠缠；抓住，紧紧握住

sentences.en: There were no instructions on how to fasten the carrying strap to the box.
sentences.cn: 没有如何把背带系在箱子上的说明。

sentences.en: When Ted was six we decided that he needed to know how to fasten and unfasten his seat belt.
sentences.cn: 泰德六岁时，我们决定让他知道怎样系和解他的安全带。
